What is the Law of Zakat?
لا يُؤْمِنُ أَحَدُكُمْ حَتَّى يُحِبَّ لأَخِيهِ مَا يُحِبُّ لِنَفْسِه
“The imperfectness of someone among you so that he loves his brother as he loves himself.(HR.MUSLIM)"
وَلَمْ يَمْنَعُوا زَكَاةَ أَمْوَالِهِمْ إِلاَّ مُنِعُوا الْقَطْرَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ وَلَوْلاَ الْبَهَائِمُ لَمْ يُمْطَرُوا
“No people are reluctant to give alms from their property, but they will be prevented from getting rain from the sky. If it were not for livestock, they would not have been given rain.(HR.MUSLIM)
And establish prayer and give zakah and bow with those who bow [in worship and obedience]. (QS. Al Baqarah: 43)”
